greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = T(n,k+1) + T(n-k,k-1) with T(0,0) = 1 and T(n,k) = 0 if k<0 or k > A003056(n).
maple: T:= proc(n,k) option remember; `if`(k<0 or k*(k+1)/2>n, 0,
seq(seq(T(n, k), k=0..floor((sqrt(1+8*n)-1)/2)), n=0..20); # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 01 2017
mathematica: Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 20}, {k, 0, Floor[(Sqrt[8n+1]-1)/2]}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Nov 14 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 01 2017
